extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is running SolarWinds Serv-U 15.4.2 HF 1 or previous versions, or SolarWinds Platform 2024.1 SR 1 or previous versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system running an affected version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected SolarWinds products to the latest versions where the vulnerabilities are patched.

affected_products: SolarWinds Serv-U 15.4.2 HF 1 and previous versions
SolarWinds Platform 2024.1 SR 1 and previous versions
